mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guin_c (guin_cno, jobcateno, memberno, name, brand, title, content, rdate, address, wage, day, period, tel, email, thumb1) VALUES (guin_c_seq.nextval, #{jobcateno}, #{memberno}, #{name}, #{brand}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{address}, #{wage}, #{day}, #{period}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{thumb1})
